attributes.action: STOP THE UK GOVERNMENT AND FUTURE GOVERNMENTS FROM TOUCHING THE PENSION POT.
attributes.background: The UK government in the past have been guilty of delving into the pension pot. It is time we put a stop to this and that includes any money put into the pot by those who do not live long enough to collect it.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
